name: Ordnance Inc - The 'Safe' Bomb Disposal Company
name_original: Ordnance Inc - The 'Safe' Bomb Disposal Company
description:
Ordnance Inc is a VR game for the Oculus Quest 2 where you play an Ordnance Removal Expert (bomb disposal) that removes old and faulty explosive devices using a variety of throwable grenades.

Containing thirty somewhat progressively harder levels combined with immersive audio and visuals the game will give you all the experience you need to go out and intern at a variety of extremely unsafe companies.

Please do not eat the delicious fireproof foam cubes.
